title: Large-Scale Flexible Language Expression and Reading Comprehension Design Through Collaborative Learning Tool Orchestration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital learning tool experience and intermediate language proficiency (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension)
context.additional_context: Experiencing flexible learning design using collaborative learning tools and mobile environments to enhance job-related language skills (business writing, presentations, document comprehension) for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently manage team project-based language activities (writing, feedback, revision) through data integration across collaborative learning tools.
Learners can construct context-specific personalized language learning pathways (integrating listening, speaking, reading, and writing) using IMS-LD-based instructional design.

Learners can apply mediation features of collaborative learning tools (real-time comments, shared document editing) in mobile environments to incorporate feedback on language expression and reading comprehension.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
